text: HI guys absolute newbie here. I want to buy some assets that are available both as a Theme and as a Template Pack. Are there any differences? or they are the same thing?
themes will use the DND editor. Template packs will use the older flexible columns method.
when you say component building.. I can build components just fine. reuse them edit them independently or globally.

Hello All ,

and i have tried in both the browsers Firefox and chrome

the issue is , it again and again redirecting me on the login page after i m filling the captcha correctly
